introduction: This animated documentary tells the story of the serpentine dancer Loïe Fuller (1862 to 1928): Dancer, inventor, pop icon of Art Nouveau, innovator of stage technology, businesswoman, filmmaker, empresaria. Numerous photographic and cinematic documents, drawings and animations reconstruct the life and work of Loïe Fuller around 1900, and show the audiences' delight in her scarcely documented stage performances.
